English.alert_about: Record and manage sounds that can be used as alarms to automatically trigger your shortcuts.
English.alert_garageband_docs:
Tap OK to open both GarageBand and AlarmCuts' documentation in Safari.

If you are using an iOS device that supports Slide Over, place Safari on top of GarageBand so you can read the instructions as you create the ringtone.
English.alert_newAlarm:
Tap OK to open Clock.

Edit the “{{sound}}” alarm for {{time}} and set its Sound to the ringtone “{{sound}}” you created in GarageBand.

Set your desired repeat interval for the alarm.

Finally, disable Snooze in the alarm.

Make sure your alarm volume is loud enough for your iOS device to hear the Siri phrase.

NOTE: If your iOS device is locked when the alarm goes off, your shortcut may not run properly.
English.alert_record_1:
Tap OK to begin recording a “Hey Siri” phrase for one of your shortcuts.

Say the phrase quickly or else iOS may start processing the Siri request before your alarm sound stops playing.

After recording, you will save the sound file and have the opportunity to open GarageBand to turn it into a ringtone.
English.alert_update_none: You are currently running the latest version of AlarmCuts.
English.error_offline: You must be connected to the internet for this feature of AlarmCuts to work.
English.prompt_garageband:
Create a Ringtone (2/2)

Next, you will create a ringtone for use by alarms in Clock. Tap Open GarageBand and follow these steps:

1. Create a new song in GarageBand.

2. Tap the Tracks View button to open Tracks view, tap the Loop Browser button in the control bar, then tap Files.

Tap “Browse items from the Files app,” then navigate to the iCloud Drive/AlarmCuts/sounds folder.

3. Tap and hold on the “{{sound}}” file.

4. Drag the audio file from the list to Tracks view.

5. Save the file as a ringtone.
English.prompt_main:
⏰ AlarmCuts

Record and manage sounds that can be used as alarms to automatically trigger your shortcuts.
English.prompt_new: When do you want the alarm to go off?
English.prompt_record_duplicate: There is already a sound file with the same name. Replace the file with the new sound, keep both, or skip?
English.prompt_record_name: Enter the name for this sound file.
English.prompt_welcome:
⏰ AlarmCuts

Record and manage sounds that can be used as alarms to automatically trigger your shortcuts.

AlarmCuts guides you in creating ringtones in GarageBand and creating alarms in Clock.

Would you like to read documentation for AlarmCuts?
